content.p: Whether you are looking to organise an event to promote your company and vacancies, attend one of our recruitment fairs, or develop something different with us, please read through our terms and conditions. These terms and conditions are designed to ensure your company, the university and students have a shared positive experience. If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please do not hesitate to contact our Recruiter Services team. Our Recruiter Services team is ready to answer your questions. +44 (0)115 82 32233 If you wish to cancel your place at an event, you must notify us by email. All cancellations must be notified to us by email. Please see below the invoicing timescales for careers fair bookings. Once an invoice has been raised, this must be settled within 30 days. December 2024 telephone: +44 (0) 115 82 32233 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: recruiterservices@nottingham.ac.uk
